Name: Dino Sour
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered lemon slice wheel and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry sail. (Skewer through either side of lemon with cherry skewered in the centre.)
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with skewered lemon slice wheel and maraschino cherry (sail).
Review: Two diverse rums combine brilliantly in this classic sour.
History: A detailed history of the Sours family of cocktails is available on our Sours cocktails page.
Nutrition: One serving of Dino Sour contains 193 calories
